channel.title: The Clay That Woke: June and July sessions
channel.description:
![Clay%20That%20Woke|690x388](upload://ohcZqTFjFbalZonZ4Eofokir5pn.jpeg)
This session is scheduled for 3 hours and will be recorded.
We’ll be playing The Clay That Woke by Paul Czege using either roll20 or, if everyone has it, Tabletop Simulator for the tokens. You do not have to attend each session, though it’s recommended because of how the character grow through their experiences. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
“Generations ago, four infant minotaurs were pulled from the mud of the eternal river. You are one of their descendants, a nameless minotaur living in a human civilization that may never again be as great as it was.” The Clay That Woke, an RPG by Paul Czege.
Minotaurs do the jobs that others don’t want. They’re the lowest rung of society and keep their code, Silence, in order to stop their baser instincts from driving them into a frenzy and heading into the dangerous depths of the jungle. Silence will be broken, society will be challenged, and the nameless may earn their names. Will you be the one who makes the Watchers, the ancient trees that stand sentinel over the City, finally bloom once more, signaling that civilization may again rise?
We will be using the X-Card and will be playing in accordance with the Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy.
**June Game: Objects of the Riverbank**
[date=2019-06-11 time=16:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/Chicago"] → [date=2019-06-11 time=19:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/Chicago"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lffl64uT9IDUwFrzWeZ
[date=2019-06-18 time=16:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/Chicago"] → [date=2019-06-18 time=19:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/Chicago"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LfflD2r01uo_FZwY3hg
[date=2019-06-25 time=16:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/Chicago"] → [date=2019-06-25 time=19:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/Chicago"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LfflW9vfdKPA_5ZxDI1July Game:
**July Game: Rise**

[date=2019-07-16 time=16:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/Chicago"] → [date=2019-07-16 time=19:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/Chicago"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lffm1-F8x5EI0RCFjcT
[date=2019-07-23 time=16:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/Chicago"] → [date=2019-07-23 time=19:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/Chicago"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LffmBKRRiHHWssaGK9Q
